search.query: sourcetype="web_ping" `website_monitoring_search_index` | fillnull value=1000 response_code | eval success=if((response_code=200 AND request_time < 500),1,NULL()) | streamstats count as totalCount count(success) as successCount values(success) as success by title | eval availability=round((successCount/totalCount)*100,2)

index="prod_web" (sourcetype="access_combined" OR sourcetype="access_combined_wcookie") host IN ("seethe.bcgov" "simmer.bcgov" "stew.bcgov" "churn.bcgov" "parch.bcgov") (root!="12cforms2" AND root!="forms*" AND root!="11gforms") | table _time root config other status | eval application=root | eval application=if(like(application, "% HTTP"), "other_apps", application) | eval config=case( in(lower(application), "ceis", "coaf", "crc", "cso-2", "cso", "dfweb", "ecrc", "essa", "filingassistant", "jpi", "lra", "opra", "psso"), "JBoss - JUSTIN", in(lower(application), "jrccordsapiwrapper", "autoefile", "carmaws", "ccd", "cdds-3", "cdds", "crrpservice", "cso-autoefile-batch-run", "cso2jpiws", "csoextws", "csojm", "csows", "dfwebws", "docUploader", "essaws", "fams", "iris-2", "iris-4", "iris", "pac", "pacws", "phis", "vipsws", "vista"), "JBoss - Justice and Attorney General", like(config, "%"), config, true(), "other_configs" ) | eval config=if((lower(application)="12cforms2" AND config="other_configs"), "other_oraforms", config) | eval duration=(round(other/1000000)) | eval config=trim(config) | eval application=trim(application) | fields application config duration status | `jag_proxy_human_readable` | fields application config duration status | eval appName=if(application="Oracle Forms 12",trim(application.": ".config),trim(application)) | eventstats count(eval(isnotnull(status))) AS totalCount count(eval(duration > 30)) AS speedCount count(eval(status > 500)) AS gradeCount by appName application config | fillnull totalCount speedCount gradeCount value=0 | eval speedPercent=if(speedCount=0,100, round(100-((speedCount/totalCount)*100),2)) | eval gradePercent=if(gradeCount=0,100, round(100-((gradeCount/totalCount)*100),2)) | fillnull speedPercent gradePercent duration totalCount value=0 | fields application config appName speedPercent gradePercent | eval icon=case( (speedPercent > 98 AND gradePercent > 98), "check-circle", (speedPercent >= 98 AND speedPercent > 96) OR (gradePercent >= 98 AND gradePercent > 96), "exclamation-triangle", (speedPercent <= 96 AND speedPercent > 0) AND (gradePercent <= 96 AND gradePercent > 0), "times-circle", 1=1,NULL()) | eval color=case( (speedPercent > 98 AND gradePercent > 98), "#53A051", (speedPercent >= 98 AND speedPercent > 96) OR (gradePercent >= 98 AND gradePercent > 96), "#F58F39", (speedPercent <= 96 AND speedPercent > 0) AND (gradePercent <= 96 AND gradePercent > 0), "#DC4E41", 1=1,"#FFFFFF") | fields application config appName icon color speedPercent gradePercent

index="prod_web" (sourcetype="access_combined" OR sourcetype="access_combined_wcookie") host IN ("seethe.bcgov" "simmer.bcgov" "stew.bcgov" "churn.bcgov" "parch.bcgov") (root="12cforms2" OR root="forms_*" OR root="11gforms") | table _time root config other status | eval application=root | eval application=if(like(application, "% HTTP"), "other_apps", application) | eval config=case( in(lower(application), "ceis", "coaf", "crc", "cso-2", "cso", "dfweb", "ecrc", "essa", "filingassistant", "jpi", "lra", "opra", "psso"), "JBoss - JUSTIN", in(lower(application), "jrccordsapiwrapper", "autoefile", "carmaws", "ccd", "cdds-3", "cdds", "crrpservice", "cso-autoefile-batch-run", "cso2jpiws", "csoextws", "csojm", "csows", "dfwebws", "docUploader", "essaws", "fams", "iris-2", "iris-4", "iris", "pac", "pacws", "phis", "vipsws", "vista"), "JBoss - Justice and Attorney General", like(config, "%"), config, true(), "other_configs" ) | eval config=if((lower(application)="12cforms2" AND config="other_configs"), "other_oraforms", config) | eval duration=(round(other/1000000)) | eval config=trim(config) | eval application=trim(application) | fields application config duration status | `jag_proxy_human_readable` | fields application config duration status | eval appName=if(application="Oracle Forms 12",trim(application.": ".config),trim(application)) | eventstats count(eval(isnotnull(status))) AS totalCount count(eval(duration > 30)) AS speedCount count(eval(status > 500)) AS gradeCount by appName application config | fillnull totalCount speedCount gradeCount value=0 | eval speedPercent=if(speedCount=0,100, round(100-((speedCount/totalCount)*100),2)) | eval gradePercent=if(gradeCount=0,100, round(100-((gradeCount/totalCount)*100),2)) | fillnull speedPercent gradePercent duration totalCount value=0 | fields application config appName speedPercent gradePercent | eval icon=case( (speedPercent > 98 AND gradePercent > 98), "check-circle", (speedPercent >= 98 AND speedPercent > 96) OR (gradePercent >= 98 AND gradePercent > 96), "exclamation-triangle", (speedPercent <= 96 AND speedPercent > 0) AND (gradePercent <= 96 AND gradePercent > 0), "times-circle", 1=1,NULL()) | eval color=case( (speedPercent > 98 AND gradePercent > 98), "#53A051", (speedPercent >= 98 AND speedPercent > 96) OR (gradePercent >= 98 AND gradePercent > 96), "#F58F39", (speedPercent <= 96 AND speedPercent > 0) AND (gradePercent <= 96 AND gradePercent > 0), "#DC4E41", 1=1,"#FFFFFF") | fields application config appName icon color speedPercent gradePercent

div.div: Reliability - percent of requests with no errors
Performance - requests that take less than 10 seconds to process
Availability - up time in the current timeframe

search.query: | where appName="CEIS" | stats latest(icon) as icon latest(color) as color by appName | eval appName="CEIS "
| where appName="CEIS" | timechart span=90s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where appName="CEIS" | timechart span=90s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"
| where title="Oracle Forms 12: CEIS" | timechart span=120s latest(availability) as Availability by title
| where appName="eCRC" | stats latest(icon) as icon latest(color) as color by appName | eval appName="eCRC "
| where appName="eCRC" | timechart span=90s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where appName="eCRC" | timechart span=90s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"
| where title="eCRC" | timechart span=120s latest(availability) as Availability by title
| where appName="Cannabis Licensing" | stats latest(icon) as icon latest(color) as color by appName | eval appName="Cannabis Licensing "
| where appName="Cannabis Licensing" | timechart span=90s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where appName="Cannabis Licensing" | timechart span=90s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"
| where title="Cannabis Licensing" | timechart span=120s latest(availability) as Availability by title
| where appName="LRA" | stats latest(icon) as icon latest(color) as color by appName | eval appName="LRA "
| where appName="LRA" | timechart span=90s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where appName="LRA" | timechart span=90s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"

| where title="Oracle Forms 12: CEIS" | timechart span=120s latest(availability) as Availability by title

| where appName="Oracle Forms 12: Figaro" | timechart span=90s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where appName="Oracle Forms 12: Figaro" | timechart span=90s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"
| where title="Oracle Forms 12: Figaro" | timechart span=120s latest(availability) as Availability by title

| where appName="Oracle Forms 12: TOSCA" | timechart span=90s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"

| where title="Oracle Forms 12: TOSCA" | timechart span=120s latest(availability) as Availability by title
| where appName="Adobe Experience Manager" | stats latest(icon) as icon latest(color) as color by appName | eval appName="Adobe Experience Manager "
| where appName="Adobe Experience Manager" | timechart span=90s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where appName="Adobe Experience Manager" | timechart span=90s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"
| where appName="ORDS" | stats latest(icon) as icon latest(color) as color by appName | eval appName="ORDS "
| where appName="ORDS" | timechart span=90s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where appName="ORDS" | timechart span=90s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"
| where application="Oracle Forms 12" OR application="Forms" | eval application="Oracle Forms 12 " | stats latest(icon) as icon latest(color) as color by application
| where application="Oracle Forms 12" OR application="Forms" | timechart span=90s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where application="Oracle Forms 12" OR application="Forms" | timechart span=90s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"
| where title="Oracle Forms 12" | timechart span=120s latest(availability) as Availability
| where appName="CCD" | stats latest(icon) as icon latest(color) as color by appName | eval appName="CCD "
| where appName="CCD" | timechart span=90s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where appName="CCD" | fields * | timechart span=90s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"
| where title="CCD" | timechart span=120s latest(availability) as Availability by title
| where appName="CCSS" | stats latest(icon) as icon latest(color) as color by appName | eval appName="CCSS "
| where appName="CCSS" | timechart span=90s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where appName="CCSS" | timechart span=90s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"

| where appName="CSO" | timechart span=90s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"
| where title="CSO" | timechart span=120s latest(availability) as Availability by title

| where appName="Courts" | timechart span=90s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where appName="Courts" | fields * | timechart span=90s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"
| where appName="Divorce" | stats latest(icon) as icon latest(color) as color by appName | eval appName="Divorce "
| where appName="Divorce" | timechart span=90s avg(gradePercent) as Reliability | search Reliability="*"
| where appName="Divorce" | timechart span=90s avg(speedPercent) as Speed | search Speed="*"

| where title="Filing Assistant" | timechart span=120s avg(availability) as Availability by title | eval Availability=round(Availability,2)
